com.untamedears.contraptions.gadgets

Class ProductionGadget

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.untamedears.contraptions.gadgets.ProductionGadget

  • public class ProductionGadget
extends java.lang.Object
    A gadget the produces a set of ItemStacks from another set of ItemStacks It can be imported from a config with the following JSON object: 
     {
   "inputs":
     [{
         "material": "MATERIAL_NAME",
         "amount": 1,
         "durability": 0,
         "name": "DISPLAY_NAME",
         "lore": "LORE"
       },...
       }],
   "outputs":
     [{
         "material": "MATERIAL_NAME",
         "amount": 1,
         "durability": 0,
         "name": "DISPLAY_NAME",
         "lore": "LORE"
       },...
       }]
 }
